name: shared-immutable
description: High-performance immutable data structures with SharedArrayBuffer for cross-worker sharing

scripts.demo:tunnel: bun demo/serve.ts & sleep 1 && npx cloudflared tunnel --url http://localhost:3000
scripts.build:wasm: asc shared-map.as.ts -o shared-map.wasm --importMemory --sharedMemory --initialMemory 2 --maximumMemory 65536 --enable threads && asc shared-list.as.ts -o shared-list.wasm --importMemory --sharedMemory --initialMemory 2 --maximumMemory 65536 --enable threads && asc linked-list.as.ts -o linked-list.wasm --importMemory --sharedMemory --initialMemory 2 --maximumMemory 65536 --enable threads && asc singly-linked-list.as.ts -o singly-linked-list.wasm --importMemory --sharedMemory --initialMemory 2 --maximumMemory 65536 --enable threads && asc doubly-linked-list.as.ts -o doubly-linked-list.wasm --importMemory --sharedMemory --initialMemory 2 --maximumMemory 65536 --enable threads

author: natanelia
